A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I enjoyed watching the movie\, but I just did not like it. Most of the humor was stale and forced\, Snoke should've been discovered more as a character\, the space battles were slow and didn't make much sense\, the addition of Rose and Admiral Holdo were not a good choice even though I loved Holdo's sacrifice scene\, General Hux was turned from such a powerful and scary leader into a pathetic\, powerless character for comedic relief\, and Luke's character could've been better. I did love the visuals and certain scenes. Hopefully I'll like this movie better if 9 ties everything together\, and Snoke\, and Luke will return.
